lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic's opponent in the U.S. Open semifinals, Gael Monfils, might just want to hole up somewhere safe until it's time to walk out on the court in Arthur Ashe Stadium on Friday afternoon.
snippet: Novak Djokovic's opponent in the U.S. Open semifinals, Gael Monfils, might just want to hole up somewhere safe until it's time to walk out on the court in Arthur Ashe Stadium on Friday afternoon....

headline.main: What to Watch at US Open: Will Djokovic Play Full Semifinal?
